name: Cobalt Strike Post-Exploitation Pipe
description: Default named pipe prefix used by Cobalt Strike post-exploitation jobs for inter-process communication

name: Cobalt Strike Status Pipe
description: Default named pipe prefix used by Cobalt Strike for status communication between beacon and operator

name: Cobalt Strike SMB Beacon
description: Default named pipe prefix for Cobalt Strike SMB beacon lateral movement, mimics Microsoft Security Essentials naming

name: Cobalt Strike Agent Pipe
description: Named pipe prefix used by Cobalt Strike agent communication channel

name: Cobalt Strike Explicit Pipe
description: Named pipe explicitly containing cobaltstrike identifier, sometimes seen in misconfigured deployments

name: PsExec Service Pipe
description: Named pipe created by Sysinternals PsExec for remote command execution, also used by attackers for lateral movement

name: Generic C2 Inter-Process Pipe
description: Generic named pipe prefix commonly used by command and control implants for inter-process communication

name: Print Spooler Abuse Pipe
description: Named pipe mimicking the print spooler service pipe, used by exploitation frameworks for PrintNightmare and related attacks

name: Metasploit/Meterpreter Pipe
description: Named pipe pattern used by Metasploit Meterpreter reverse_named_pipe payloads

name: Meterpreter Named Pipe
description: Named pipe containing the meterpreter identifier, used by Metasploit payloads

name: Credential Dumping Pipe
description: Named pipe associated with credential dumping tools such as Mimikatz for LSASS interaction

name: Covenant C2 Pipe
description: Default named pipe prefix used by Covenant C2 framework grunt implants

name: CrackMapExec Pipe
description: Named pipe associated with CrackMapExec lateral movement and credential harvesting tool

name: Sliver C2 Named Pipe
description: Named pipe prefix used by Sliver C2 framework implants for encrypted communication
